item.title: About
item.description: Hugo is the world’s fastest framework for building websites. It is written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: https://github.com/russross/blackfriday https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma https://github.com/muesli/smartcrop https://github.com/spf13/cobra https://github.com/spf13/viper Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

item.title: How
item.description: Do you care about the work I’m doing? Be my boss and you’ll be directly involved in — and responsible for — everything I create, publish, or send out into the world. And it works like any employee/employer relationship: Pay me a monthly salary. You choose the amount ($1 per month minimum), based on what you think my work is worth, what’s in the budget, or how much you want to give.
